As sad as it feels to say it, this game has hackers EVERYWHERE. Valve can't and won't fix it, so put your time into something that will actually feel good and rewarding. Have I talked about the skin market? Jesus christ, just go do something else.

Terrible game do not buy. I purchased the prime upgrade to avoid games with hackers but I can confidently say that over 75% of my competitive matches have included cheaters of some kind. the matchmaking system is broken as I am either matched with people lower than my skill level or drastically higher than my skill level but never actually matching my skill level. Ranks are pointless as they do not actually affect who you get into a game with. The Valve Anti-Cheat system does not work properly. The developers would rather focus on releasing new paid content to make more money from the users than actually fix the problems that affect genuine CS:GO players ability to play the game. Please don't waste your money, go play Counter-Blox on Roblox as the developers of that game actually have a better understanding of how to make a playable game.

Very fun with friends, good for laughs and very skill based shooter with a large skill gap. Would definitely recommend this game if you are looking for something that involves more than aim, this game requires game knowledge, proper movement mechanics, recoil patterns and control, utility usage and much more. There is a wide map variety that really helps to engage players and there is a very fun community.
Good game to play with friends

Probably one of the best games I have ever played, Ive had some highs and lows in the game. There can be really toxic games and really good games, some days my aim is on point and some days my aim is worse than a trash can. I would recommend this game to anyone who is into competitive and very aimed based games. 10/10
